Hello fellow kerbonaughts

As you will have seen (Yes, everyone has seen the trailer), the UI for KSP 2 is... slightly confusing. Alot of people are used to where things are in ksp one.

So the request is, even if the game isnt out, but is it feasibly possible to re-shuffle them so it is at least somewhat reminiscent of KSP 1 UI layout

Thanks (In about 4 months advance)

The superluminal Gremlin.
